document_data.name: Velzraedo Hlaklavarr
document_data.mainbody: '''Velzraedo Hlaklavarr''' was an envoy from [[Calimshan]] in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was almost as fat as [[Mirt]]. Velzraedo was thickly [[perfume]]d and dressed mostly in purple [[silk]]s, with gilt weave [[boots]] and a [[turban]].
document_data.Personality: He was quite effusive with words and affected an entitled manner.
document_data.Relationships: He employed six bodyguards, and considered himself the First Finger of the [[Masked Vizier]].
document_data.Possessions: Besides the purple silks, turban and gilt weave boots, he carried a number of silk [[dagger]]s on his [[belt]].
document_data.History: He got in a confrontation with Mirt over seating in the [[Brave Bustard]] tavern in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, and was promptly knocked out before his bodyguards could react. On their way out, the bodyguards quickly got into trouble all on their own: per [[Beldrigarr Stoneshield]], he was being sought for using counterfeit currency to pay at the [[Sunset Sail]].
